page.title: 20KNOTTINGLEY CARNIVAL+CREDITS
page.content: Carnival_highlight of the town's year: "When I was in the{Carnival}last year I was a Munchkin in the Wizard of Oz. Half way up Ferrybridge Hill the {lorry}jerked.We all fell over but luckily nobody fell off the float. We had a round picture of flowers and birds with our name on.Mine said Melanie Munchkin. This year,I was a page boy standing by Prince Charming. Caroline was Prince Charming.Victoria was Cinderella and Anouska was another page boy.The{Brownies}won the shield. This year we won again and received Â£15." {CARNIVAL:see Photograph C {###################################### Pages 11 to 20 researched & written by children of{St.Botolph's Middle School classes 2,3,4,6,7&9 with help from local firms(not all named in text) Wakefield and Selby District Councils, local residents,clergy and parents.
